full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Intermediate Technical Writer

**Job Title:** Intermediate Technical Writer
**Contract Reference Number:** W8486-249648/A
**Publication Date:** June 20, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** July 05, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

## Contract Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking services of one (1) Intermediate Technical Writer to work under Stream 3, Project Management Services of the Task-Based and Solution-Based (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) E60ZT-18TSPS. The contract is for an initial term of one (1) year, with the option to extend for up to two (2) additional one (1) year periods. This opportunity is open to pre-qualified suppliers under the TSPS Supply Arrangement.

## Contract Requirements

* Provide intermediate-level technical writing services to support project management activities
* Develop high-quality written documents, including reports, user guides, and policies
* Collaborate with project teams to gather information and prioritize writing tasks
* Meet deadlines and deliverables as outlined in the contract

## Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest cost-per-point principle.

## Security Requirements

* Supplier must have a Secret level security clearance
* Documents must be safeguarded at a moderate level (No higher level needed)
* No FOCI review required

## Location of Work

* Region: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Specific Location: 975 Blvd St-Joseph, Gatineau, Quebec

## Contact Information

Jennifer Ouellet, Contracting Authority
Email: [jennifer.ouellet2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jennifer.ouellet2@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 598-1547

## Additional Information

* The contract will be awarded to a pre-qualified supplier under the TSPS Supply Arrangement.
* The supplier must comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.
* The contract includes a security clause requiring a Secret level security clearance.
* The location of work is in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## How to Bid

Pre-qualified suppliers under the TSPS Supply Arrangement are eligible to bid on this opportunity. Interested suppliers must submit their bids electronically in accordance with the instructions outlined in the contract documents.
